languages.text: В экипаже шептались, что в жилах одного из потомков Леди Иокасты текла кровь Версерианов. В породистом лице юноши прослеживалась благородная стать, свойственная этому роду. Так ли это на самом деле, и могла ли решительная и бескомпромиссная натура госпожи Зауэрбэк привлечь достопочтенного Сенешаля — загадка.

There were whispers among the crew that one of Mistress Sauerback's children had Werserian blood in him. Something of the noble features particular to that family could be discerned in the young man's genteel face. Whether it was true — whether Jocasta's resolute, uncompromising nature could have, and had, attracted the venerable Seneschal — remained a mystery.
languages.original_text: В экипаже шептались, что в жилах одного из потомков Леди Иокасты текла кровь Версерианов. В породистом лице юноши прослеживалась благородная стать, свойственная этому роду. Так ли это на самом деле, и могла ли решительная и бескомпромиссная натура госпожи Зауэрбэк привлечь достопочтенного Сенешаля — загадка.

traits.locale_text: There were whispers among the crew that one of Lady Jocasta's children had Werserian blood in him. Something of the noble features peculiar to that family could be discerned in the young man's genteel face. Whether it was true — whether Lady Sauerback's resolute, uncompromising nature could have, and had, attracted the venerable Seneschal — remained a mystery.

Something of the noble features particular to that family could be discerned in the young man's genteel face. Whether it was true — whether Jocasta's resolute, uncompromising nature could have, and had, attracted the venerable Seneschal — remained a mystery.

languages.text: In den Reihen der Crew kursierten Gerüchte, wonach in einem der Kinder von Meisterin Sauerback Blut der Familie Werserian floss. Im vornehmen Gesicht des jungen Mannes waren tatsächlich die edlen Züge dieser Familie erkennbar. Ob das Gerücht der Wahrheit entsprach – und Jocastas resolutes und abweisendes Wesen den ehrwürdigen Truchsess für sich eingenommen hatte – blieb ein Geheimnis.
languages.original_text: There were whispers among the crew that one of Mistress Sauerback's children had Werserian blood in him. Something of the noble features particular to that family could be discerned in the young man's genteel face. Whether it was true — whether Jocasta's resolute, uncompromising nature could have, and had, attracted the venerable Seneschal — remained a mystery.

traits.locale_text: In den Reihen der Crew kursierten Gerüchte, wonach in einem der Kinder von Meisterin Sauerback Blut der Familie Werserian floss. Im vornehmen Gesicht des jungen Mannes waren tatsächlich die edlen Züge dieser Familie erkennbar. Ob das Gerücht der Wahrheit entsprach – und Jocastas resolutes und abweisendes Wesen den ehrwürdigen Truchsess für sich eingenommen hatte – blieb ein Geheimnis.

languages.text: Le bruit courut au sein de l'équipage que l'un des enfants de maîtresse Sauerback avait du sang Werserian. En effet, on pouvait déceler sur le visage distingué du jeune homme certains des nobles traits transmis de génération en génération au sein de cette auguste famille. Pour autant, nul ne sut jamais avec certitude si le naturel sans compromis de Jocasta avait bel et bien attiré le vénérable sénéchal dans ses filets.
languages.original_text: There were whispers among the crew that one of Mistress Sauerback's children had Werserian blood in him. Something of the noble features particular to that family could be discerned in the young man's genteel face. Whether it was true — whether Jocasta's resolute, uncompromising nature could have, and had, attracted the venerable Seneschal — remained a mystery.

traits.locale_text: Le bruit courut au sein de l'équipage que l'un des enfants de maîtresse Sauerback avait du sang Werserian. En effet, on pouvait déceler sur le visage distingué du jeune homme certains des nobles traits transmis de génération en génération au sein de cette auguste famille. Pour autant, nul ne sut jamais avec certitude si le naturel sans compromis de Jocasta avait bel et bien attiré le vénérable sénéchal dans ses filets.

languages.text: Corrían susurros entre la tripulación de que uno de los hijos de la maestra Sauerback tenía sangre Werserian. Algunos de los nobles rasgos característicos de la familia podían verse en la amable cara del joven. Nadie llegó a saber si de verdad era así. Si la naturaleza firme y decidida de Jocasta había atraído al venerable Senescal.
languages.original_text: There were whispers among the crew that one of Mistress Sauerback's children had Werserian blood in him. Something of the noble features particular to that family could be discerned in the young man's genteel face. Whether it was true — whether Jocasta's resolute, uncompromising nature could have, and had, attracted the venerable Seneschal — remained a mystery.

traits.locale_text: Corrían susurros entre la tripulación de que uno de los hijos de la maestra Sauerback tenía sangre Werserian. Algunos de los nobles rasgos característicos de la familia podían verse en la amable cara del joven. Nadie llegó a saber si de verdad era así. Si la naturaleza firme y decidida de Jocasta había atraído al venerable Senescal.

languages.text: クルーの間では、ザウアーバック女史の子供の一人がウェルザリアンの血を引いていると囁かれていた。その若者の上品な顔立ちに、彼の家計特有の高貴なる特徴が見て取れたのだ。果たしてそれがそれが真実なのかどうかは…ジョカスタの毅然とした妥協を許さぬ性格が由緒正しい家令長を魅了できたのか、そして実際に魅了したのかは謎のままだ。
languages.original_text: There were whispers among the crew that one of Mistress Sauerback's children had Werserian blood in him. Something of the noble features particular to that family could be discerned in the young man's genteel face. Whether it was true — whether Jocasta's resolute, uncompromising nature could have, and had, attracted the venerable Seneschal — remained a mystery.

traits.locale_text: クルーの間では、ザウアーバック女史の子供の一人がウェルザリアンの血を引いていると囁かれていた。その若者の上品な顔立ちに、彼の家計特有の高貴なる特徴が見て取れたのだ。果たしてそれがそれが真実なのかどうかは…ジョカスタの毅然とした妥協を許さぬ性格が由緒正しい家令長を魅了できたのか、そして実際に魅了したのかは謎のままだ。

languages.text: 船员中有传言说，苏尔贝克女士的其中一个孩子身上流着韦尔森家族的血脉。从那个年轻人文雅的脸上，不难看出韦尔森家族特有的某些高贵特质。那些传言是真的吗？苏尔贝克坚毅刚强、毫不妥协的性格，是否真的赢得了德高望重的总领青睐？这些问题的答案无人知晓。
languages.original_text: There were whispers among the crew that one of Mistress Sauerback's children had Werserian blood in him. Something of the noble features particular to that family could be discerned in the young man's genteel face. Whether it was true — whether Jocasta's resolute, uncompromising nature could have, and had, attracted the venerable Seneschal — remained a mystery.

traits.locale_text: 船员中有传言说，苏尔贝克女士的其中一个孩子身上流着韦尔森家族的血脉。从那个年轻人文雅的脸上，不难看出韦尔森家族特有的某些高贵特质。那些传言是真的吗？苏尔贝克坚毅刚强、毫不妥协的性格，是否真的赢得了德高望重的总领青睐？这些问题的答案无人知晓。

languages.text: Mürettebat arasında Sauerback Hanım'ın çocuklarından birinin Werserian soyundan geldiğine dair fısıltılar döndü. Delikanlının nazik yüzünde bu aileye has soylu yüz hatları göze çarpıyordu. Fısıltıların hakikat olup olmadığı, Jocasta'nın kararlı ve taviz vermeyen tabiatının muhterem Seneşal'e cazip gelip gelmediği hususu ise gizemini korudu.
languages.original_text: There were whispers among the crew that one of Mistress Sauerback's children had Werserian blood in him. Something of the noble features particular to that family could be discerned in the young man's genteel face. Whether it was true — whether Jocasta's resolute, uncompromising nature could have, and had, attracted the venerable Seneschal — remained a mystery.
